title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.   Â          A Mammoth weekend of learning about Mammoth Cave starts April 18 at the 11th Research Symposium at Mammoth Cave National Park, hosted by the Western Kentucky University branch of the Mammoth Cave International Center for Science and Learning. The event is held in the park at the Training Center this year. Click here to download a copy of the schedule of events.
